content: 2in measured over sole double crochet pattern worked in the round using 3mm hookor size needed to achieve correct gauge 5 st side panels measure 2cm when you are making your gauge swatch make sure it is done in the round as your gauge may differ between row and rounds it is essential to work to the stated gauge to ensure success 2 3 pattern heel flap cuff for the heel you are working back and forth in row and double_crochet over half the sock leaving the rem top of the make 9ch foot sts unworked work 1 double_crochet into ch2-sps row 1 1dc in second chain from hook 1dc in every chain row 1 rs ch1 1dc in first st fphtr around each to end turn 8 sts of next 2fphtr 1dc in each of next 19 21 23 st and row 2 ch1 does not count as a st here and chain-sps fphtr around each of next 2fptr 1dc in throughout working in back loop of every st 1dc next st turn leaving rem 23 25 27 sts unworked in every st turn 25 27 29 sts repeat row 2 further 42 44 46 times 44 46 48 row row 2 ch1 1dc in each st to end of row turn in total ending with rs facing for next row 25 27 29 sts seam cuff ch1 sl-st first and last row of cuff together row 3 ch1 1dc in first st 1fphtr around each of next working in blo of each st do not fasten_off 2fphtr 2 row below 1dc in next 1fphtr around next st 2 row below 1dc in next st 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 2 row below 1dc in next leg st turn rotate piece to work in row-ends of cuff row 4 ch1 1dc in each st to end of row turn working in row ends work ch1 10 7 5 double_crochet row 5 ch1 1dc in first st 1fphtr around each of 2dc in next row end 10 6 5 double_crochet 2dc in next row end next 2fphtr 2 row below 1dc in next 1fphtr around 2 3 4 times 0 1 0 double_crochet sl-st to first double_crochet 48 52 56 double_crochet 1fphtr 2 row below 1dc in next st 9 10 11 times 1fphtr around each of next 2fphtr 2 row below 1dc in next st turn round 1 ch1 does not count as a st here and row 6 ch1 1dc in each st to end of row turn throughout 1dc in first st * fphtr around each of next 25 27 29 sts 2 sts ch2 miss next st 1dc in next st ch2 9 10 11 times miss next st 1fphtr around each of next 2 sts ** repeat row 5 and 6 a further 7 8 9 times 1dc in next st repeat from * to ** once sl-st to first st total of 20 22 24 row worked on the
